languages.text: {n}Махарий ненадолго отводит взгляд и отвечает вам, коротко усмехнувшись.{/n} "Я всегда считал Ториану слишком слабой для участия в подобных... авантюрах, но, судя по всему, мое мнение о ней было ошибочным".

traits.locale_text: {n}Махарий ненадолго отводит взгляд и отвечает вам, коротко усмехнувшись.{/n} "Я всегда считал Ториану слабой для участия в подобных... авантюрах, но судя по всему, мое мнение о ней было ошибочным".
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}Sauerback looks away briefly and replies to you with a curt laugh,{/n} "I have always thought Toriana too weak to participate in such... risky ventures, but it seems I was wrong about her."
languages.original_text: {n}Махарий ненадолго отводит взгляд и отвечает вам, коротко усмехнувшись.{/n} "Я всегда считал Ториану слишком слабой для участия в подобных... авантюрах, но, судя по всему, мое мнение о ней было ошибочным".

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharias averts his gaze briefly and replies to you with a short laugh.{/n} "I had always thought Toriana too weak to participate in such... ventures, but it seems that I have been wrong about her."
traits.speaker: Zaurback

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius looks away briefly and replies to you with a curt laugh.{/n} "I have always thought Toriana too weak to participate in such... risky misadventures, but I seem to have been wrong about her."
traits.speaker: Zaurback

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius looks away briefly and replies to you with a curt laugh.{/n} "I have always thought Toriana too weak to participate in such... risky misadventures, but I seem to have been wrong about her."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback looks away briefly and replies to you with a curt laugh,{/n} "I have always thought Toriana too weak to participate in such... risky ventures, but it seems I was wrong about her."
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}ザウアーバックは一瞬目をそらしてから、素っ気なく笑って答える。{/n}「トリアーナにはそんな…危険な橋を渡るような度胸はないと常々思っていましたが、それは思い違いだったのかもしれません」
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback looks away briefly and replies to you with a curt laugh,{/n} "I have always thought Toriana too weak to participate in such... risky ventures, but it seems I was wrong about her."

traits.locale_text: {n}ザウアーバックは一瞬目をそらしてから、素っ気なく笑って答える。{/n}「トリアーナにはそんな…危険な橋を渡るような度胸はないと常々思っていましたが、それは思い違いだったのかもしれません」
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克短暂地移开目光，嗤笑一声，回答了你的问题。{/n}“我一直以为托丽安娜太过软弱，不可能参与这种……风险巨大的筹谋，但我似乎看错她了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback looks away briefly and replies to you with a curt laugh,{/n} "I have always thought Toriana too weak to participate in such... risky ventures, but it seems I was wrong about her."

traits.locale_text: {n}马卡里乌斯短暂地移开目光，嗤笑一声，回答了你的问题。{/n}“我一直以为托丽安娜太过软弱，不可能参与这种……风险巨大的筹谋，但我似乎看错她了。”
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}Sauerback détourne brièvement les yeux et s'autorise un petit rire avant de répondre :{/n} « J'ai toujours cru Toriana trop faible pour participer à ce genre... d'opérations risquées, mais j'avais visiblement tort. »
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback looks away briefly and replies to you with a curt laugh,{/n} "I have always thought Toriana too weak to participate in such... risky ventures, but it seems I was wrong about her."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius détourne brièvement les yeux et s'autorise un petit rire avant de répondre :{/n} « J'ai toujours cru Toriana trop faible pour participer à ce genre... d'opérations risquées, mais j'avais visiblement tort. »
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}Sauerback aparta brevemente la mirada y te responde con una risa cortante.{/n} «Siempre he tomado a Toriana por alguien incapaz de participar en aventuras tan... arriesgadas, pero me temo que me equivocaba».
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback looks away briefly and replies to you with a curt laugh,{/n} "I have always thought Toriana too weak to participate in such... risky ventures, but it seems I was wrong about her."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius aparta brevemente la mirada y te responde con una risa cortante.{/n} «Siempre he tomado a Toriana por alguien incapaz de participar en desventuras tan... arriesgadas, pero me temo que me equivocaba».
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}Sauerback blickt kurz weg und antwortet dir dann mit einem knappen Lachen.{/n} "Ich habe Toriana immer für zu schwach gehalten, um an solchen ... riskanten Unternehmungen teilzunehmen, doch offenbar habe ich mich in ihr getäuscht."
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback looks away briefly and replies to you with a curt laugh,{/n} "I have always thought Toriana too weak to participate in such... risky ventures, but it seems I was wrong about her."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius blickt kurz weg und antwortet dir dann mit einem knappen Lachen.{/n} "Ich habe Toriana immer für zu schwach gehalten, um an solchen ... riskanten Unternehmungen teilzunehmen, doch offenbar habe ich mich in ihr getäuscht."
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}Sauerback, bir an için gözlerini kaçırıp kibar bir kahkahayla yanıtlıyor.{/n} "Toriana'nın böylesi... Riskli maceralara girişmek için fazla korkak olduğunu düşünürdüm. Yanılmışım."
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback looks away briefly and replies to you with a curt laugh,{/n} "I have always thought Toriana too weak to participate in such... risky ventures, but it seems I was wrong about her."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback bir an için gözlerini kaçırıp kibar bir kahkahayla yanıtlıyor.{/n} "Torina'nın böylesi... riskli maceralara girişmek için fazla korkak olduğunu düşünmüşümdür hep. Yanılmışım."
traits.speaker: Zaurback
